text: An Open Heart is a book written by the Dalai Lama Tenzin Gyatso and Nicholas Vreeland published by Little, Brown and Company, in 2002 The book explains the fundamentals of Buddhism. Category:Eastern philosophy Category:Books by the 14th Dalai Lama Category:Philosophical literature Category:Books about Buddhism Category:2002 non-fiction books
title: An Open Heart (book)
